parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds a backpack to a unit (even non-local).<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Warning </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> Beware, the backpack added with this command will be created on the PC [[local]] to the unit you are adding it to, even if executed on the server. Because of this, if non-local unit is the target and one tries to immediately access added backpack, the backpack returned will be [[objNull | Null]]. When adding backpack dynamically to a remote unit, wait until backpack is added (See Example 2)</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''addBackpackGlobal''' backpack

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - soldier
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> backpack: [[String]] - backpack class name

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[addBackpackGlobal]] "B_AssaultPack_khk";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_unit [[spawn]] 
{
	[[if]] (![[isNull]] [[backpackContainer]] [[Magic Variables#this|_this]]) [[then]]
	{
		[[removeBackpackGlobal]] [[Magic Variables#this|_this]];
		[[waitUntil]] { [[isNull]] [[backpackContainer]] [[Magic Variables#this|_this]] };
	};
	[[Magic Variables#this|_this]] [[addBackpackGlobal]] "B_AssaultPack_khk";
	[[waitUntil]] { ![[isNull]] [[backpackContainer]] [[Magic Variables#this|_this]] };
	[[backpackContainer]] [[Magic Variables#this|_this]] [[addMagazineCargoGlobal]] ["30Rnd_556x45_Stanag",5];
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addBackpack]], [[backpackContainer]], [[firstBackpack]], [[unitBackpack]], [[backpack]], [[backpackCargo]], [[getBackpackCargo]], [[backpackItems]], [[addBackpackCargo]], [[addBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[removeBackpack]], [[clearBackpackCargo]], [[clearBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[clearAllItemsFromBackpack]], [[loadBackpack]], [[backpackSpaceFor]], [[canAddItemToBackpack]], [[addItemToBackpack]], [[removeItemFromBackpack]], [[everyBackpack]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]</root>
